scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../part3/phonebook-backend/
scripts.update:server: git add . && git commit -m 'updated server' && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: cd ../.. && git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook-backend/ phonebook-backend-heroku main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add build/ && git commit -m 'updated frontend' && npm run deploy
